src:
上沼、２０年ぶりのフジ出演「西高東低」くっきり　関東１桁も関西は１７・７％

05 Nov 2019

　関西の大御所タレント・上沼恵美子（６４）が、約２０年ぶりにフジテレビの番組に出演したことで話題となった１日放送の「上沼恵美子×坂上忍の東西べしゃり歌合戦」が、関東地区の平均視聴率が８・５％で、関西地区は１７・７％だったことが５日、分かった。
　番組は坂上とのダブルＭＣながら、上沼のものまねで人気の天才ピアニスト・ますみ（３２）がデフォルメしたメイク姿で上沼と初対面するなど、上沼が“主役”だった。（数字はビデオリサーチ日報調べ）
text:
Uenuma, Fuji appearance for the first time in 20 years

05 Nov 2019

“One-day broadcast“ Emiko Uenuma x Shinobu Sakagami's East-West Bessy Song Battle ”, which became a hot topic after Kansai ’s great talent, Emiko Uenuma (64), appeared on a Fuji TV program for the first time in about 20 years, It was found on the 5th that the average audience rating in the Kanto area was 8.5% and that in the Kansai area was 17.7%.
The program was a double MC with Sakagami, and Uenuma was the “main character”, such as Uenuma's popular imitation pianist Masumi (32), who first met Uenuma. (Numbers are from the Video Research Daily Report)
